message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you consider that?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $165. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. Can you consider that?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still a bit above your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $140. I'm willing to compromise again, so I'm counteroffering at $155. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value and I'm getting close to my minimum price.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. Can you consider that?

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $130. I'm getting close to my minimum price, so I'm counteroffering at $160. This is my last compromise, and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your last compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I've already made my last compromise at $160. I'm not willing to go any lower than that. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options. I'm still open to discussing, but I need to be fair to myself.
